_default.accouttext: Sign in to access Government of Canada services.
_default.infopanel:
Once signed in, you can access all Government of Canada services.

For example, you can access your CRA My Account for Individuals, My Service Canada Account (MSCA), IIRC account, and My VAC Account to name a few.

https://rp1.tbstest.catslab.ca.accouttext: Sign in to access Government of Canada services.
https://rp1.tbstest.catslab.ca.infopanel:
Once signed in:

  • You can access all Government of Canada services.
  • For example, you can access your CRA My Account for Individuals, My Service Canada Account (MSCA), IIRC account, and My VAC Account to name a few.

https://rp2.tbstest.catslab.ca.accouttext: Easily manage and view your Employment Insurance (EI), Canada Pension Plan (CPP) and Old Age Security (OAS) benefit details.
https://rp2.tbstest.catslab.ca.breadcrumbs:
• Home
  • Employment and Social Development Canada
https://rp2.tbstest.catslab.ca.infopanel:
With My Service Canada Account you can:

  • check your EI application status and messages
  • submit EI reports
  • view your tax slips and records of payment for EI, CPP, OAS
  • apply for Canada Pension Plan (CPP)
  • change your address
  • set up/change direct deposit
  • receive email notifications of changes
  • and much more

My Service Canada Account is fast - transactions are processed immediately.

It's convenient for filing EI reports - submit directly online and save time.

To avoid technical problems in MSCA:
Donâ€™t bookmark secure MSCA pages (the pages you see after you log in), use a supported browser and enable cookies and JavaScript

https://rp3.tbstest.catslab.ca.accouttext:
Use My Account to get answers fast.

My CRA Account My Account is a secure portal so you can view and manage your personal income tax and benefits online.
https://rp3.tbstest.catslab.ca.breadcrumbs:
• Home
  • Taxes
  • E-services
  • E-services for individuals
https://rp3.tbstest.catslab.ca.infopanel:
With My Account you can:

  • track your refund
  • view or change your return,
  • check your benefit and credit payments
  • view your RRSP limit
  • change your address
  • set up direct deposit
  • receive email notifications of changes
  • and much more

My Account is fast - transactions are processed immediately.

It's convenient at tax time - you can use Auto-fill my return when you file online using certified software.

You can also set up a payment plan through My Account. To make an online payment, go to Make a payment.
